description: Learn how to add a resource type and a product to your Nexudus account. This product can be configured with money credit to be used for bookings, events, products or any other purchases, even plans.
introduction_markdown:
In Nexudus, **products can have any combination of passes, money credit, and time credit**. Passes can be used to check customers in and control access to your IT network. When a customer is checked in, the pass is used. Money credit can be set to be valid to pay for bookings, events, products, or any other purchases, even plans. If the buyer is a contact (i.e., they are not a member; they don't have an active contract), the benefits added to the product are only released when the product is paid.

This guide will show you how to set up a new product with money credit to be used in your space.

sub_steps.step_description_markdown: To add a new resource type, you must first navigate to the **Inventory** section of the dashboard.
Once in the **Inventory** section, click on **Resource types**.
If you haven't created any resource types yet, click on **Add resource type**.
In the **Type name** field, enter the name for your resource type. In this case, we will add **Large Meeting Rooms**.
Click on the **Save changes** button to save the new resource type.
Once in the **Inventory** section, click on **Products**.
Click the **Add product** button.
Click on the **Manual entry** button.
In the **Product name** field, enter the name for your product. In this case, we will add **Large Meeting Room Credit**.
In the **Product description** field, enter a description for your product. In this case, we will add **$100 of credit to be used in large meeting rooms**.
Navigate down to the **Portal and Apps** section and in the **Category** field, enter a category for your product. In this case, we will add **Benefits**.
Click on the **Save changes** button to save the new product.

steps.step_title: Adding Money Credit to a product

sub_steps.step_description_markdown: From the **Products list**, click on the **Large Meeting Room Credit** product that we just created.
Click on the **Benefits** tab.
Click on the **Add money credit** button.
In the **Credit description** field, enter a description for your credit. In this case, we will add **Meeting Room Credit**.
In the **Credit amount** field, enter the amount of credit you want to add. In this case, we will add **100**.

In the **Bookings** section, select the types of bookings that this credit can be used for. In this case, we will select **This credit can only be used to pay the following types of resources** and then select **Large Conference Rooms** and **Large Meeting Rooms**.
Click on the **Save changes** button to save the changes.
And you're done!

title: Adding Products with Money Credit
